svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - January 13 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 13, 2024" date: "2024-01-12"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Goerli shadow fork 2
: stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases Fork choice filter change: to be
included in Deneb Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed Electra EIPs & PeerDAS
Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases
Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases
‚Ä¢ Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb
Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb

Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed Electra EIPs & PeerDAS

Dencun interop testing call video

Ephemery testnet upgrades to Dencun January 18

up to $500k

v24.1.1 Prysm v4.2.0 Teku v24.1.0

Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold Social action options to tackle a concentrated
actor
üö® Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Social action options to tackle a concentrated actor
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly
cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Increasing gas limit debate: P√©ter Szil√°gyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change Marius
van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client
diversity Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas Dankrad Feist: wait until
after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs Vitalik: modest increase is
reasonable
Increasing gas limit debate:
‚Ä¢ P√©ter Szil√°gyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change
P√©ter Szil√°gyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change
‚Ä¢ Marius van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times &
client diversity
Marius van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client
diversity
‚Ä¢ Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
‚Ä¢ Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs
Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs
‚Ä¢ Vitalik: modest increase is reasonable
Vitalik: modest increase is reasonable
‚Ä¢ Besu halted on mainnet January 6, ~70% of Besu nodes impacted, hot fixed
Besu halted on mainnet January 6, ~70% of Besu nodes impacted, hot fixed
‚Ä¢ Reth state & history growth dashboard
Reth state & history growth dashboard
‚Ä¢ Nethermind State Database experimental approaches: Paprika, Path-Based Storage & Halfpath
Nethermind State Database experimental approaches: Paprika, Path-Based Storage & Halfpath
‚Ä¢ Explainers: EIP7002 (execution layer triggerable exits) & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
Explainers: EIP7002 (execution layer triggerable exits) & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
Research
‚Ä¢ EF Research team AMA , discussions include: EIP4844 data publishing without scaling, composability
across rollups, Lido, security budget, capping signatures to 8192 per slot, gas limit increase, native
(enshrined) rollups, EigenLayer, MEV burn & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
EF Research team AMA , discussions include: EIP4844 data publishing without scaling, composability
‚Ä¢ Staking economics: issuance impact on staking equilibrium & reward curve options
Staking economics: issuance impact on staking equilibrium & reward curve options
MEV
‚Ä¢ Proposals for relay incentivization : low-latency relay mesh network and enshrining missed slot
penalty on proposers
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ OP Stack Canyon upgrade live on Superchain mainnets, adds Shappella support (including PUSH0),
reduces rate of basefee change & adds Create2Deployer
OP Stack Canyon upgrade live on Superchain mainnets, adds Shappella support (including PUSH0), reduces
rate of basefee change & adds Create2Deployer
‚Ä¢ RollCall (L2 standards) video & notes : RIP7212 (R1 precompile) made final, EIP7587 (reserve RIP
precompile addresses) discussion and RIP working groups (precompiles, EIP4844 testing & fee markets)
RollCall (L2 standards) video & notes : RIP7212 (R1 precompile) made final, EIP7587 (reserve RIP
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIPs EIP7591 : BLS signed transactions EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification
EIP7594 : PeerDAS (peer data availability sampling)
EIPs
‚Ä¢ EIP7591 : BLS signed transactions
EIP7591 : BLS signed transactions
‚Ä¢ EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification
EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification

NFTs ERC7593 : NFT synthetic evidence

‚Ä¢ ERC7589 : Semi-fungible token roles

Remix v0.40.0 : Ape framework Vyper compiler, Uniswap v4 templates & Circom v2.1.6

Wise Lending ~177 ETH exploit via precision issue

Ecosystem

Enterprise

Unicef Rwanda using staking to fund school internet connectivity

Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.2 to 483.5 gwei, with 26.2 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 21.9 gwei 3.2k ETH net burn this week

Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei

ETHUSD : $2,185 - $2,698, currently $2,497
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.06 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.06 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ USDC & EURC v2.2 upgrade complete: reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
USDC & EURC v2.2 upgrade complete: reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
‚Ä¢ OpenSea email onboarding : create non-custodial wallet via email address using Privy
OpenSea email onboarding : create non-custodial wallet via email address using Privy

Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here

ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team

account was compromised via a phone number without 2FA

General
